location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Last Page of a Letter from David Anderson Blane, Resident in the Persian Gulf, at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is truncated, possibly as a result of weeding, which means that the first half of the letter is missing; the author is therefore unknown. The subject is also unknown, though the Resident claims to have no power to act on the matter.The letter has been marked with a large blue cross from top to bottom.
